website_summaries.verdict: Nonslip, space-saving, ultra-slim, velvet-lined hangers in black.
pros: Nonslip velvet material holds clothes in place without slipping or sagging
contoured shoulders keep clothes in shape, and notches help keep accessories in place
Slim design to maximize closet space
Durable hangers that hold clothing weighing up to 10 lbs
Hangers come in packs of 30, 50, or 100
cons: Some complaints of cheap construction resulting in hooks or other parts breaking
black lint coming off onto clothes

customer_reviews.title: If you want a cloud of black dust in your house and on you clothes, then buy these.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the set of 50 based on the 3k reviews. When I took them out of the bag, I placed them on my bed- a king size with white sheets. Immediately, I discovered a cloud of black dust all over the place. I ran my hand on the hanger, and the velvet flocking just came off. If you read other reviews, you will see similar experiences. I have other velvet hangers that do not shed like this. I am shocked that Amazon would put their name on such a defective product. These are going back asap and now I have to wash my sheets - that were literally just washed and put on the bed prior to this. Grrrrrr.
customer_reviews.author: Domestic Diva

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for about a month and several have snapped off and broken. I haven't put anything heavy on them, only lightweight summer clothes. You can see in the photo this one snapped from a silk dress. Frustrated that I have to find new hangers again.
customer_reviews.author: Dervla

customer_reviews.title: Velvet dust coming off
customer_reviews.text: These were the highest rated hangers and were at a good price... Well, the one star reviews were accurate. I pulled the hangers out and rubbed the velvet between two fingers. SO MUCH black velvet dust or specks came off and stuck to my hand. When I looked at where I laid the hangers on the floor, I can see a film of the black dust. If this bothers you, you should go with wooden or stainless steel or even plastic hangers. On the plus side, Amazon gave me my refund easily with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Green

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: All of the reviews on here are a complete lie. These reviewers must have been sent free items. The hangers shed everywhere. My hands, clothes and floors (where I took them out of the box) are covered in black. I rely on reviews and I could not believe the quality of these hangers when I received them. I hung up half of my tops before realizing what was going on. This is the worst product. The photo is from me tapping one hanger onto a paper towel.
customer_reviews.author: JDuke

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the first use!
customer_reviews.text: The hanger broke as I took it out of the bag!!!! Bad quality!!! So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Quang

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Reviewing bc there are so many GROWN adults crying over bs. They’re hangers. They do the trick. 1. these hangers are cheap AF, so if they break O M G get over it and spend $15 to order another set OR go to your local dollar store, get some super glue, and fix it. Again SUPER CHEAP! 2. Why are we rubbing the velvet when we order??? Are y’all dumb???? $15 hangers are gonna rub off. Again C H E A P - you want better quality, SPEND THE MONEY FOR BETTER QUALITY! 3. Before you right a childish review, act your age & not your shoe size. Smh.
customer_reviews.author: Darnesha Benson

customer_reviews.title: That's fine, plenty left
customer_reviews.text: 6 of the hangers were broken upon delivery. The hooks snapped off. Thought it was something that happened during delivery, but I opened them a bit late so I couldn't return them. That's fine, plenty left, right? Then they started snapping and breaking once I actually used them. A tank top broke one of them. Do not recommend. ☆this is the only review I've ever done, they are that bad☆
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality hangers
customer_reviews.text: This really are quality hangers. Size is perfect, holds a good amount of clothes if necessary (2-3 pants, for example), and keeps clothes from wrinkling. As mentioned in a couple of reviews, this hangers also don’t occupy a lot of closet space.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: I hate these hangers
customer_reviews.text: The material they use to coat the hanger is very fuzzy and gets all over the clothes. I hate these hangers.
customer_reviews.author: kim gloria

customer_reviews.title: Beware of cheaply made hangers
customer_reviews.text: These hangers were a complete waste of money. Taking them out of the box, two of them immediately broke when the hook detached from the cheaply made velvet. After all these positive reviews I was surprised at the poor quality and returned them right away.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for a month or so and have already broken 3 or 4! They just come apart where the metal is inserted into the hanger. The velvet material also makes everything stick to them - it’s actually hard to pull clothes off of them, tho it’s nice for drying wet clothes as you can avoid pokey spots in shoulders. Would not buy again! They look almost exactly like hangers I have that I love, but quality is not the same.
customer_reviews.author: Stasi

customer_reviews.title: Leaves your clothes covered in black dust
customer_reviews.text: This product is horrible. The velvet is practically shedding all this black dust off of the hangers and left all my clothes dirty. I noticed it and thought maybe cause theyre new. I wiped them down with a dry cloth and it didnt help at all. I would return them for my money back but I am living in Pakistan and its more a hassel than its worth. The clothes also stick to the velvet and do not hang right. I thought these would be nice but id rather have the plain plastic hangers any day.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTOPHER SHERIDAN

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: I have used and enjoyed the JM name brand and was looking for those on Amazon. The selection isn't great and I needed suit hangers so I bit the bullet, took a chance, and ordered this brand because suit hangers were not available in the preferred brand. In a nutshell, they will be returned. They are not the same. The flocking sheds, the frame is flimsy and I can tell the hook would likely break off with a heavier item. I would have saved myself some trouble if I had just gone to the big box and picked these up there because now I have to make the trip after all.
customer_reviews.author: CAF

customer_reviews.title: Buy these, now!
customer_reviews.text: Now I can have the organized closet of my dreams! Many previous reviews complained about the quality, but I think they are incredible for the price. So far, none of them have broken and I have not had issues with black dust on clothing (not even white shirts). Even if a few break, this bundle is still worth the price. There was black dust on the bottom of the shipment box, but I haven’t had an issue since then. I have been using them for the last two months, and they’re fantastic. I purchased 100 for myself, and will probably purchase some for my boyfriend soon. Highly recommend, you will not regret!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sheds black particles everywhere, very low quality velvet
customer_reviews.text: Immediately upon opening the box, there were piles of black dust/particles everywhere that came off from the “velvet” material of these hangers. This kind of velvet is extremely low quality. I have velvet hangers that I bought from a department store many years ago that are much higher quality in touch and feel and have never shed like this. I am quite surprised by the amount of positive reviews. In my opinion, I would never want to use this for any of my clothing, from my nice formal clothes to even my casual ones for fear of my clothes being ruined or stained/dirty. Returned this and went for some non velvet hangers instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Get's the job done, Looks Decent,  Ok Priced.
customer_reviews.text: So nothing get's me super excited about these hangers but nothing disturbs me about them either. They are a decent price, have decent durability and are uniform in color and design so they look decent in the closet. If you are looking for a basic hanger, this would be it.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Beware of shedding!
customer_reviews.text: Worst hanger ever! I bought these to hang blouses that slip off other hangers. When I took them out of the box, the black began shedding on my table and on my hands. No way could I hang anything on these hangers! Fortunately, Amazon has refunded my money!
customer_reviews.author: NW in NH

customer_reviews.title: Never order them again!
customer_reviews.text: Just like the other reviews say, the hangers break if I even try to hang a t-shirt on it, and YES, the metal hanger comes out and the slot where they're supposed to be is so small, no wonder it can't hold that part in. These are the worst hangars I have ever had in my life; if the metal hangar part stays attached to the hangar you should say a prayer of thanks. I wish I had kept all that have fallen apart..the only reason I have the one pictured is because it just fell apart this afternoon while I was hanging shirts from my dryer! A total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: jes058

customer_reviews.title: Dirty Staining Defective Hangers
customer_reviews.text: The dirty black dust that shed from these hangers stained all my clothes and bedspread. They were filthy and unsealed when they arrived and I didn’t realize until it was too late. The hangers are poor quality to begin with but the fact that it also left my clothes stained black with the dirt that came off them is unforgivable.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Yuck!  Hangers shed black dye/soot all over everything!
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are an abomination. Upon opening the package, I noticed the intern bag was covered in a black soot-like substance. I decide to wipe them down with a damp cloth to try and clean them, but even after a thorough scrubbing they continue to shed black dye/soot all over my hands and the white towel. I suppose if you are only using them for black clothes they would be acceptable, otherwise save your money and your wardrobe from the havoc.
customer_reviews.author: A.N.M.

customer_reviews.title: Awful Quality, The Worst Item I Ever Bought.
customer_reviews.text: Black dusts came off from its "velvet surface" and ruined all my clothes. For some, just slightly touching it covers my hands all over with those black dusts. These are not easy to clean either. It is definitely a non-salable grade item.
customer_reviews.author: Hyun

customer_reviews.title: These are very pretty and efficient - but if you're impatient, they're not for you
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these look with all my clothes hanging on them. It gives my closet a fresh and orderly feel. They definitely serve their purpose of being non-slip, and they save about a fifth of the space that traditional plastic hangers use. The only drawback is; it is fairly difficult to get your clothes on and off of them. I have found that hanging clothes from the laundry now takes me noticeably longer than before (using plastic hangers). For me, it's a pretty big drawback. I will stick with these simply because I loves the way they look. Beware: you will not like these hangers if you are impatient and/or don't enjoy time spent on laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Anders

customer_reviews.title: Black dust!
customer_reviews.text: Dust! Black dust! Clothes, bedding(where I hung clothes on the hangers) my clothes all covered in black dust! After I had hung everything, noticed black dust, checked the box and it has dust in the box! Amazon was good about it and refunded me but I was really hoping to like these hangets given the price. Unfortunately had to get rid of these and buy regular velvet hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Good hangers for slippier blouses and strappy dresses but skip for tshirts.
customer_reviews.text: PROS: As described. Good quality, especially for the price. Pretty color. Slim. Can fit more garments in the closet on these than standard plastic hangers. Silky and strappy garments don’t slip off. CONS: - Tshirts (the majority of what I own and hang) are so difficult to hang on these. The grippy velvet is too grippy for cotton. Almost impossible to get the shirt on straight. Probably not the best hangers for cotton. - Because they are so grippy, you have to really stretch the neck out to slide the shirts on.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am in disbelief that Amazon would send out hangers of this quality with their name on them! There is black dust all over the place after opening one of the packs. It's all over my bed and my hands. I tried using a lint roller to try and salvage them and that's covered as well. I'm disappointed bc I could have gone to tj maxx or Burlington, or any local store and received better quality than this. I've never had any other hangers do this before. I would never hang my clothes on these and you should be ashamed amazon. I'm sending these back immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great hangers for the price.... although I straight up have too many hangers now and nowhere to hang them! I had been slowly but surely switching all of my hangers from the traditional plastic kind to these velvet ones. I heard that they take up less room and in general they hold my (women’s) clothes better than the other kind. When I saw how many for the price was available I grabbed them! But now that they’re here I realized it was too many! First world problems. These do seem a little less sturdy than the ones I’ve gotten elsewhere, but I’m not concerned
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: I love them and they are the best!!! My box of 50 was perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: The hangers are great. I have been using them for about a week. The packaging came wonderful and they were in bundles of 10 hangers. However, some of the hangers were cracked and broken. I am not sure if this is due to poor quality assurance or shipping mishaps. The box was in perfect condition upon arrival. We first ordered 50 and they came perfect. It was the box of 100 hangers that had the broken ones. If amazon makes it right, I’ll update my review. UPDATE: amazon completely refunded my order and let me keep the usable hangers which has been great!! I am very happy with my product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: No shedding and Super lightweight
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I was skeptical about buying these. Well I bought them anyway and they're pretty good. They are definitely light weight and slightly bendy. However, I don't vigorously move my clothes around so this isn't a problem. So far, there is no shedding. It does save a ton of space and I love it. I bought the 100 pack and will be placing another order. (I have a ton of clothes.) No broken hangers were found upon unboxing and they were shipped out on time. Would definitely recommend to a friend. 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Black dye comes off onto apparel
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made and the black dye used on the felt literally shook off . Just setting the hangers down on the white counter left a black residue . I have only used them on black clothing at this point out of fear of them ruining my clothing
customer_reviews.author: Traci H.

customer_reviews.title: Left black debris all over
customer_reviews.text: Bought 50 of these in black to replace some old broken hangers. Opened the box in my laundry room and the white labels were covered with black debris from the hangers "shedding". Thought maybe it was just a factory/packing issue, so I took them out and started hanging them on the bar over my white laundry room sink. Looked at the skink and it was covered in black debris from the hangers shedding. It was a big mess. I didn't want that debris all over my laundry room, clothing and my closet. Ended up donating them.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M.

customer_reviews.title: A lovely black dust awaits you....
customer_reviews.text: By all means buy these if you would like to experience a fine, black, velvety dust over every nook and cranny of your home. I made the unfortunate error of placing these on my white tile counter top before I knew. Let’s just say there was some serious scrubbing and swearing that took place.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Shed a lot of dust-like black velvet
customer_reviews.text: I live by velvet hangers, so when I moved and needed to buy more I figured these Amazon Basics ones would do fine. They are your typical velvet hangers except that they have black dust-like stuff that falls off of them. I had it on my carpet from unpacking the hangers, my jewelry boxes that were below the hangers once I put them up, and on my hands. For the price you're paying for these, I would recommend just getting them at TJ Maxx or a home goods store rather than ordering these if you don't want to deal with a black velvet mess.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole F

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I actually love these hangers. I was able to get all my clothes hung in my small closet. None of my hangers broke and the grey color hasn’t transferred to any clothing. They like really nice. There’s absolutely no flexibility though so with tight neck items you have to hang them by going from the bottom (inside the shirt or dress) up to the neck area. I love these and luckily I was able to find more at Ross in a pinch to get my closet finished.
customer_reviews.author: Eselay Nails

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I've throne away all my Wire Hangers, "I only use the Velvet Hangers!" I've purchased numerous of these Hangers in all colors. Truly, never purchased so many for SUCH A REASONABLE PRICE. The Velvet Hanger keeps the shape of my clothing for delicate items, wash and wear items and even dry cleaned clothing looking new. I would never put wet items on a velvet hanger, BECAUSE IT WOULD DAMAGE THE VELVET MATERIAL. I recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun J.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend velvet hangers
customer_reviews.text: I bought the pact of 30 grey velvet hangers, and I have been really happy with my purchase so far. It really just makes hanging clothes so much nicer, and easier. The velvet makes sure that the clothing does not just slip off, but instead hangs comfortable on the hangers. I have found that some velvet hangers kind of transfers some of the fluff/velvet onto my clothing, which is no good, but I have not had that experience with this kind. I am not sure about durability, since I have just recently started using them, but so far I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aurelia

customer_reviews.title: Buy the hangers and avoid the hanger clips that are sold elsewhere.  Great hangers clips never arrive
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love the hangers and have reordered them we like them so well. As for the hanger clips offered under another product number I'm not so impressed.The Finger Clips I have ordered both in 2016 and again in 2017 along with the hangers and the hangers arrive and are great quality and we love the way they work but the finger clips NEVER ARRIVE and are a total loss. It's like the vendors that sell the clips are just looking to take your money so beware of purchasing the clips but the Hangers are a no brainer as they are very good quality and work great.
customer_reviews.author: Gary K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, great quality, and awesome price!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! The hangers are very well made, and the price is unbeatable for the amount and great quality. I highly recommend these hangers, especially if you’re looking to save space, and don’t want “dents” from other types of hangers on your clothes! I actually received the product 3 days early, (products are being sent by importance at this time) which was a really great because I was in the middle of putting more summer clothes into my closets, and didn’t realize how low I was on the previous hangers I bought (also from Amazon).
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Space saving and no clothes slippage
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice slim hangers. I saved so much room in my closet by switching out the bulker hangers I had. I love how they are non slip. Bear in mind that being non slip, there are some shirts that don't work well with these hangers. For example, shirts with tight necks that you have to slide the hanger into neck, work better on plastic because these are so clingy it is hard to maneuver them into smaller neck holes. They are exceptional sturdy and don't flex, so I easily hang jeans on them. If I were to make one improvement it would be to be able to rotate the hook.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Mom

customer_reviews.title: Break easily
customer_reviews.text: Loved these hangers so much I immediately bought a second box. It's been 2 weeks and now they are all breaking just like the photos that others have posted. I only have lightweight lularoe items on these, for those that don't know, they are the same weight (or lighter) as a T-shirt. I walk into my closet every morning and find more clothes on the ground. I'm so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in comparison to most AmazonBasics products.
customer_reviews.text: AmazonBasics products are usually the products I feel most comfortable buying as they are always fantastic products. These hangers however are a true disappointment. The first 3 hangers that I pulled out of the plastic wrapping completely fell apart followed by several more. Truly unsatisfied and I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great slim fit sliders, but not for heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: I was so impressed with the space saved in my closets and the ease with which the hooks slide over the bar, that I ordered 100 of these! I changed every hanger in my closets and donated all my old hangers to Goodwill. But on the last few hanger exchanges I found a broken hanger. Now one out of 200 is not a big deal .... The thing that gives me concern is the discovery that the metal hanger is barely attached to the plastic frame. It would not be good for heavy coats. Thankfully I did not give away all my nice wooden hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected hangers for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: I looked at many products and many reviews and this seemed the best choice for my daughters clothes. I expected shedding from the soft fuzzy material but it hasn’t yet. The handles rotate once you gently move them initially. Just be careful turning them at first then there is no issue. My only criticism is that they need deeper notches for straps but overall the product works great. Doesn’t leave lines or marks even on sweaters. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: OtakuHime

customer_reviews.title: Do it! No regrets!
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever thought about how thin your shirts are? And how those plastic white hangers are actually thicker than your shirt? These hangers are so thin, I swear just switching has freed up so much space! They’re velvet like material so they hold the shirt in place. Those slick button ups? Won’t slide. Definitely recommend. I’ll never go back to white plastic hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Black dust everywhere and gets on your clothes!
customer_reviews.text: These are worst hangers I have ever purchased. They came right from China as evidenced by all the Chinese writing on all the packaging. The plastic bags they came in were full of black fibers that came off the hangers. This should have been my first warning. I took them out and shook them off outside. Thinking the excess came off I tried to use them to hang my clothes and the black dust got all over my clothes. Don’t buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa T.

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers, cheaper at Sams Club.
customer_reviews.text: Love these hangers. They look super clean and nice hanging in our newly remodeled closet! I got rid of most of my plastic hangers for these guys. The velvet makes the clothes a little more time consuming to put on them, but you don’t have to worry about them slipping off either. The only problem is, after I spent so much money for them on here, I found the exact same ones at Sams Club, 50 hangers for $13 🤦‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my first few hundred hangers from Wayfair, the Wayfair basics ones, but didn't want to spend that much when I needed a couple more packs. To my delight, these were the EXACT same ones, same packaging and everything, for a good bit less money. My clothes never slip off no matter how much I abuse them in my overcrowded closet. These are also nice and narrow so you can fit more into the same space. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaMarie

customer_reviews.title: THEY SNAP IN HALF. DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. THEY SNAP IN HALF!!! I could not believe it. Every time I’d grab one off the rod I’d hear SNAP! And this is with normal woman’s tops or bottoms hanging on them. I’m attempting a return. I ended up buying Timmy steel wire hangers instead. They’re great and I’ll leave a review for those next. These are garbage and they SHED BLACK FUZZ EVERYWHERE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nemi Poyot

customer_reviews.title: If I break one or two hangers a trip I feel like that's not too bad
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I have ordered these hangers multiple times form different sellers. I have yet to get a box with broken hangers. The mettle hook will snap out and the hanger itself will break on occasion, but that is to be expected when I take my inventory from place to place. I typically have 30 items together on hangers in a bag and pile them up in the back of my SUV to transport 500+ clothing items at a time. If I break one or two hangers a trip I feel like that's not too bad. If you are just using these for your own personal closet then they should hold up great!
customer_reviews.author: Mia D

customer_reviews.title: Break very easily
customer_reviews.text: I like the sleek design and love having the same hangers in my closet... but if you have something slightly heavy, or if you have a tight closet and things are in there closely, these are not the hangers for you. They snap pretty easily and are worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Carrigan

customer_reviews.title: Complete crap!!
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are EXTREMELY CHEAP and fragile. They arrived with white ashy stains on them (that resembled deodorant streaks). I have had them for not even a week and 2 have already snapped. One when I tried to hang up a coat, and another when I tried to take a shirt off of the hanger. These are COMPLETE CRAP.
customer_reviews.author: KSaxi

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THESE. They are defective. These hangers are covered in black dust/powder that sheds EVERYWHERE. I have ordered three boxes of these. The time a year ago and they were fine. The second a time a month ago; they had the weird black dust but I thought maybe they were just defective so I ordered another box. These were exactly the same as the previous—weird black dust/powder that gets all over EVERYTHING!!). Amazon you need to fix this!
customer_reviews.author: Emma C

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy easily fell apart
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about these, but had several break as I was hanging clothes, flimsy. Kind of annoyed because I needed all of them but not gonna go through the hassle of taking down my whole closet again to return them and a few broken ones
customer_reviews.author: Janessa Axelsen

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Seems durable but I’ve limited myself to using it to hanging slippery blouses. Hangers do a great job of keeping them from falling off. Velvet makes it too sticky to hang sweaters on it. I’m able to hang more with these hangers compared to traditional plastic hangers. The hangers are rather wide/broad so if you’re a petite woman, you may find that the shoulders of your tops don’t line up exactly to the tips of the hangers. The tips end up somewhere inside the sleeves, which would leave a rather awkward mark on the sleeve if the blouse ends up not being worn often
customer_reviews.author: GE-79

customer_reviews.title: Velvet lint everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed with these hangers. I bought another set for my child and they were great. These hangers came covered in velvet lint. The bag they came in was appeared gray. I opened one pack and took out a hanger and it covered my hand with the lint making it obvious that I could not use these for my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Hello Nads

customer_reviews.title: Good hangers!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because my husband and I needed more hangers and I liked the idea of the "non slip" aspect for the wide neck/thinner material tops. So far, it's worked really well for that. I have not experienced getting the black velvet material on my clothes like other reviewers have complained about. I gave it 4 stars because the hook broke off when my husband was pulling his pants off of the hanger while it was hanging. His pants are on the heavier side and he was probably using a bit too much force but we've never experienced this issue with our good old plastic hangers. Overall, we're happy with these but still use plastic hangers in addition.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany W.

customer_reviews.title: I love these hangers!
customer_reviews.text: I love these hangers! So much, I bought more for my entire wardrobe. They have a thin width for the hanger, but still sturdy. They lay my clothes neatly and I am able to fit more things in hanging up. I saw some people reviewed the felt coming off on their clothes but I haven't had that issue thus far. I also saw reviews of the hangers breaking but once again I've had no issues. Although, they do twist and it appears you can unscrew them from the base of the hanger. Pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Crystalh

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Slim
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the cream color. I've ordered these several times and continue to be pleased. They hold a good amt of weight (2 jeans or 3 pants or 4 leggings is my typical use) and I've experienced no shedding. I like to hang damp clothes so I personally wouldn't purchase the black - just in case there's color bleed from the hanger - but have no issue with that with the cream on light or dark colored clothes. I like the swivel hook too. I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Different color shade from picture
customer_reviews.text: If you need safe a space at your closet, it’s the right choice. Just one thing, at the picture it’s more white/cream color, in real more yellow color, not really pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Velvet rubs off
customer_reviews.text: The hangers seem to be sturdy but the velvet rubs off pretty easily leaving black marks on my clothes so I took off a star. The head part of the hanger doesn't turn either which bugs a little because if I accidentally put the shirt on the wrong way I have to re do it I can't just turn the head which bugs so it lost another star.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t last a lifetime, but are good for now
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for eliminating closet hanger clutter. I recently decided to switch out all of my non velvet hangers and have seen great results of storage improvement since the switch. While these hangers aren’t the most durable or sturdy, they do they’re job. A few of my hangers arrived broken, then I also recently moved with these hangers and a few broke along during the move. I personally love velvet hangers and I will be repurchasing for the price and convenience of buying these hangers. If you’re looking for something that is very well made and will last a life time- probably not these hangers. Overall they will make space and for the time being are convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis S.

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye plastic hangers!
customer_reviews.text: These are great, and so much cheaper than you’d find at Walmart or target. They are a bit wobbly if you’re hanging heavy winter coats or flannel jackets on them, so I’d recommend them for just normal shirts, pants, tanks, lightweight hoodies/sweatshirts, etc. They are truly non slip, made with a velvety finish material. I’ve finally gotten rid of all my mismatched plastic hangers, and my clothes don’t slip off these at all! It’s also saved some space in my closet since these aren’t bulky like the plastic ones.
customer_reviews.author: Sara7787

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: After I got sick of breaking plastic wally-world clothes hangers regularly I started replacing them with some hangers similar to these from bed, bath, beyond. These Amazon hangers are pretty much the same as the ones I was getting from bedbath, except the price is FAR cheaper from amazon. The color is slightly different, but other than that they are identical. These hangers are very strong/sturdy. I haven't broken any yet. I would have to guess that my clothes will tear before the metal hanger breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: No slide, space saving hangers!
customer_reviews.text: We were hesitant to spend a pretty penny on hangers, when we get so many for free through our local dry cleaning service. However, this was 100% worth the purchase. These hangers have been great when packing them up for a move, and extremely efficient in hanging clothes. My wife has several wide opening tops that constantly slide off other plastic or metal hangars, but these are great for keeping the closet tidy without a single item sliding off the hangars. I also have several non-cotton pants for work that are always a hassle: sometimes bending metal hangars and rarely staying on plastic hangars. The velvet hangars have been a tremendous relief to our closet situation!
customer_reviews.author: Sarahi Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Worst Hangers Ever
customer_reviews.text: Hangers are cheaply made. When trying to hang shirts the hanger literally snaps; I’ve never used a hanger that was so low quality. Also the swivel hook works but be careful because it will also break right off. Worst product I’ve ever bought from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid hangers but take longer to put clothes on it
customer_reviews.text: These are a good deal and if you want to shrink the size of your closet down these hangers are a good option. They are made in a thin design so you can fit a lot of clothes together. The only negatives for me is that it takes about twice as long to put a regular tshirt on this hanger compared to a full plastic hanger. The suede texture gets stuck on the sleeves when putting it on. Also I can't turn the hanger hook around so its stuck in one static position if you want all the hooks to face the same way then be aware when putting the clothes on.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, no issues
customer_reviews.text: I bought 100 hangers in gray, and used them for mine and My husbands clothes. I’m super happy with these as they look uniform and sleek. They also saved us a ton of room in the closet. I haven’t had any of them break on me yet, and the fuzz has not rubbed off on my clothing. So far, 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Sumpbox

customer_reviews.title: Velvet-er believe it.
customer_reviews.text: I love velvet. I would wear velvet underwear if that were appropriate (but it isn't). These hangers maintain full control of even the pesciest, stealthiest, "I'm going to hang for you until you sneeze too near me and then you better believe I'm falling on your closet floor" pieces of clothing. They almost hang on to clothes a little too well. Like, calm down, it's my shirt, just give it to me. They are also so slim and offer a nice uniform look that any crazy person would enjoy in their closet that only they see.
customer_reviews.author: SqueegyBuckenheim

customer_reviews.title: Like crack.
customer_reviews.text: I have been slowly replacing all those awful plastic hangers with these luscious, soft, velvety ones over the last few years...they take up less space and clothes stay put (even irregular necklines/straps). But most importantly, they help create a neat, uniform, organized closet (an ugly, chaotic closet would haunt me at night - so thank you for the sweet dreams). Buy more than you need because once you consolidate, you'll have more room for more clothes - happy shopping!
customer_reviews.author: JBV

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these hangers - great value!
customer_reviews.text: Recently I got rid of all the plastic hangers in my closet and started with a similar version from the container store for a lot more money. When I saw I could find them here at a fraction of the cost, I was pumped. They arrived in great condition and are just as nice as the ones I bought in store. Even match the color I bought. I also loved that I could buy so many at once for such a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen McFee

customer_reviews.title: Big girl clothes
customer_reviews.text: Replaced all my plastic hangers with these. They are a great price and design. I am a plus size woman, so my clothes slip off regular plastic hangers or I have to use the ones with the notches They still slip off or get wrinkled at the neck or shoulder. My clothes stay on these and the slim design means I can fit more in a smaller place. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Closet Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: Bought 300 of these hangers and replaced all my white plastic hangers. Saved so much space. I didn't have any problems with them leaving black fuzz or anything like that on my clothes. Compared to white hangers, my close hardly slip off of them. The hanger part of it, when you first get them you have to give it a little turn (you'll hear a little pop), this will make it rotate easier and make prevent breaking them when they are in use. Cheaper on Amazon than buying it in store... Also, I like my hangers to match so this way I can just buy exactly that instead of hunting them down in stores if I needed more.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Bogus Review???  "Clother stay in place"
customer_reviews.text: Funny thing...I just received these hangers from my NEIGHBOR...UPS did it again, can't seem to find our house despite huge numbers on our garage and the neighbor's decorative sign with their name on it. Oh well, a couple of days delay didn't hurt anything. However, I came here to write my review and it showed that I already reviewed the product. What??? The review said, "Tired of my clothes sliding off the cheap plastic hangers. These are a perfect solution!" Who wrote this??? Not me...I checked the items I reviewed yesterday and this was not among the ones I wrote!!! What the heck is going on???
customer_reviews.author: Deb Z

customer_reviews.title: Space savers
customer_reviews.text: The #1 feature of these is that they save so much space because they are much thinner than normal plastic hangers. The downside is that it's super annoying to hang clothes on these because they're super "sticky"—the velvet hangs on to fabric. GREAT for keeping clothes from falling off hangers, not so great for the actual hanging process, especially if you're hanging up something with a small neck hole. But that comes with the territory so I won't knock off any points for that.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I already have these type of felt hangers from another company but needed more which is why I bought these. I just moved into a new apartment and my coat closet isn’t wide enough for a traditional hanger. I like these because you can turn the metal part, whether just a little or to flip the direction of the hook. I needed to be able to slay the hangers to get the coats to fit in the closet and by being able to turn the metal hook part, they are able to fit. I attached a picture that shows the coats sideways a bit but the metal hook straight.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful streamline closet!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these hangers. An entire matching set of hangers really transformed my closet. I have had these for many months now and zero have broken or been a problem. They do shed a bit, I mostly noticed it when I was changing out all of my clothes and had the entire pack of hangers on my white bedding, but I do not notice anything on my clothing after hanging them up. I am very pleased with these hangers. I would recommend them to anyone who wants a streamline look to their closet. I just wish I had done it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy junk
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy. Didn't start breaking until return window had passed (Amazon needs to do something about this). These hangers break on their own when just about anything is hung on them. A cotton woman's shirt is too much for them. Really terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers but they come with so much residue!!
customer_reviews.text: I love velvet hangers for the grip that it has on clothes to prevent it from slipping, so when I went to get some more I settled on these. I like the hangers and they are sturdy but I gave it 4 stars because there was so much loose velvet fibers and residue in the packaging and anywhere that I put the hangers down when I was organizing my closet. I didn't want to chance hanging anything that was a light color on to these hangers for fear that the residue would ruin those items.
customer_reviews.author: Ebonizrainbow

customer_reviews.title: Who writes a good review of hangers?  Yep, that good!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, they are hangers of a type of style. I didn't expect much as they don't cost that much. I got them and was really surprised how much nicer they are than expected. When was the last time you can say that? I mean, don't get all excited and order them and think your life will take a turn for the better just because you own them, on the other hand not having your clothes fall off the other plastic hangers is a cool thing indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Fish

customer_reviews.title: Organizing done easy.
customer_reviews.text: Love them ! They make it so spacious compared to normal bulky plastics. However, the one issues I immediately noticed is just like other reviews say; they're very weak so be careful pulling clothes off of them . Also, they have velvet fur coming off of them (not all but a couple groups in the 100pc) so that's why I gave 4 stars but all in all. Worth the buy. Cheapest way to keep your house looking organized and matching. Reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value! Space saving style.
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these gray velvet hangers whenever I see them in local stores. When I saw that I can buy 50 for $20 I jumped at the chance! They are exactly what I was looking for. The velvet keeps clothes from slipping off, and the gray color is nice because it doesn't show up the dust. Switching from plastic hangers to these has saved me a lot of space in my closet as well! Thanks for a great product and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kts

customer_reviews.title: Love that these keep my clothes Off The Floor!
customer_reviews.text: I really love that my clothes stay on these hangers and don’t end up in the bottom of my closet! This is my second purchase of this style of these hangers. I also purchased the hangers without the bottom support, love those as well. The only improvement I would like to see is that the silver part that hangs on the rod actually swivel!!! That would be so, so nice!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonWoman

customer_reviews.title: These are great, they do exactly what they are supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: They are hangers. They hang things. Nothing will slip off, that's for certain. They can hold a suit without sagging or breaking. They make my closet look much cleaner and less cluttered than the plastic hangers I was using. Package of 100 comes with 4 packs of 10 and 4 packs of 15, for a total of 100. I saw some people complaining there were only 80, and they may have missed that half the packs were 15 instead of 10.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Breaks too easily.
customer_reviews.text: They break too easily. Out of the 30 I purchased, I've used about half and four so far have just snapped where the metal meets the body of the hanger. I had some velvet hangers that I used in my motorhome for 10 years that never broke regardless of the abuse to which they were put. Hanging up a suit jacket and putting it in a travel case shouldn't create so much strain as to break it. I'm not sure if this is a faulty batch or if they are just very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: COUNT THEM WHEN THEY ARRIVE
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm really happy with these hangers, I was able to save space in my closet, and even make room for my boyfriend's clothes. However, I had ordered 2 packs of 100 hangers but recieved 2 packs of 80 hangers, I don't know where the mix up occurred but customer service was able to send the missing hangers, the missing hangers created a small inconvenience for me and that is why I gave them only 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lei McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: A couple of hangers were broken when I received them, others have split or the hook has come out. I also don't like the indentations. They keep shirts from hanging smoothly. These were a big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: KJK

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: While these look attractive on Amazon, be warned: these are the flimsiest hangers I have ever had. I've already broken one and have only been using them for a week. You can see the hanger bend when you wave it in the air. If you're considering buying these to make your closet look tidier, just stick with your sturdy plastic hangers instead.
customer_reviews.author: Biggs

customer_reviews.title: Sheds. Like a lot.
customer_reviews.text: I can also verify that my recent order of hangers leave black velvet dust everywhere. Don't have time to switch them for new ones so settled for wiping them down with a wet cloth which took longer than expected. Even now, every rustle of the hangers still leave a fine black dust on the white shelves below, just not as much. All flocked hangers shed a little but this is excessive enough for me to write this. TL;DR - Sheds black dust everywhere. Great price though! Purchase if you have a good vacuum, air purifier, and a wardrobe of dark clothing.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adore these hangers
customer_reviews.text: For one thing: this is one of the best deals I've seen on these hangers. I bought a dozen from Bed, Bath, and Beyond a few weeks earlier for an embarrassing $10. Doing the math, to get the same number of hangers there as are listed in this product would be a little double the price here. There's no difference between these hangers and the BB&B ones, either. All just sturdy, pretty-looking, keep clothes from falling off... And now I feel like a real ADULT with all matching hangers. <3
customer_reviews.author: Codexx

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Hangers
customer_reviews.text: I love these hangers. I can hang up so much more in my closet now because they’re so thin. And my closet looks so clean and organized with uniformed hangers. The velvet keeps clothes from sliding off and I haven’t noticed any shedding at all. The metal hook seems like it’s stuck in place and doesn’t rotate, but you have to use pressure to turn it until it snaps and then it will rotate freely and easily after that.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Worth Buying, BUT!
customer_reviews.text: These hangers have come in handy on many occasions and are well made, sturdy, and the velvet that these hangers are made of, (like others!), DO NOT shed onto your clothing. Would have rated them a 5*, but the hook attached to the hanger, DOES NOT TURN! Nothing more frustrating then realizing you have hangers turned opposite directions in your closet, meaning you have to remove the clothing instead of a twist to a hook!
customer_reviews.author: Caddy

customer_reviews.title: Broken before and after
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved and took the plunge to change out all my plastic plastic hangers to these velvet hangers because I had a couple friends tell me they "are so amazing". Well, that is not the case for me. Each box ive ordered at least 5 hangers have been broken and then when I've gone to hang up a shirt the dang hanger breaks at the neck. Now I'm down to 35 of the 50 hanger box. I'm not impressed and actually irritated with each purchase. I am glad I kept my trusty plastic hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Stamps

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these hangers in the mail earlier this week and immediately started switching out all my mismatched, hodgepodge plastic hangers. None of these new velvet hangers were broken, and they appear to be fairly sturdy. Keep in mind I'm only using them for lightweight tank tops. Didn't seem to notice any shedding issues either. It's amazing what a difference these hangers make and I love how clean and organized the closet feels now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pack of hundred only 2 broken hangers
customer_reviews.text: I reaaly liked the hangers wish two had not been without the hook not even sure if they were broken as the hooks were not in the box....??? They are great hangers others save a ton of space and grip well ordering more and redoing more closets ..
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Edson-Greenwald

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy for suits. Fine for lightweight blouses
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t put a man’s suit on these bc they aren’t sturdy enough. I’m keeping & using for lighter weight clothes like blouses. But they bend the way wire hangers do if you have heavier clothes to hang & I certainly wouldn’t hang a jacket on them. But for lighter weight they’re adequate. The velveteen surface is fine & works well. But Next time I’ll pay more & get a sturdier hanger.
customer_reviews.author: Songsmith

customer_reviews.title: I didnt know a hanger would be a life game changer....
customer_reviews.text: I won't lie. I'm cheap. I have always owned those cheap plastic hangers that seem super durable and get passed down from person to person. The problem? Plastic is slippery and my clothes always end up in a pile on the floor. So, finally frustrated with my laundry I purchased these hangers and now I AM HOOKED. The clothes stick to these suckers like they are superglue on. No more pile on the floor...no more ironing because why hang up stuff if it's just gonna fall off....I am forever changed. I immediately purchased another set so I could rid myself of the dreaded plastic crap I have been using for years.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Conserve space, but will the black velvet get on clothes.
customer_reviews.text: These hangers take up much less space than plastic or wooden hangers. These seem a bit more flexible than my Walgreens purchase. My main concern is whether the black velvet will be on my clothes when I remove them from the hangers. When I removed the bottom layer of hangers from the box, it was covered with loose black velvet. I had already used the first fifty. The box held one hundred hangers. As far as durability goes, I haven’t used them long enough to say.
customer_reviews.author: three dogs

customer_reviews.title: Joan Crawford would've hated these.
customer_reviews.text: Same problem as everyone else. These hangers shed. There was even a layer of black dust inside the shipping box. Do not buy these unless you buy a pack of lint brushes too I kept mine as I use them to hang fabric in my sewing room. I will not be using them to hang the clothing I make out of the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: moltabocca

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I redesigned my room and my accent colors are black and cream. I got the beige hangers and they work great. I haven't had a problem with them falling apart or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Loribelle

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect size
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to return these - yet I went out of the country and missed the return window. For some reason these hangers are the size of baby hangers. But no where in the product description does it say that - I assumed they would be normal adult size. Guess not.
customer_reviews.author: Clairejane R.

customer_reviews.title: Closet game-changer
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after bingeing the Home Edit on Netflix. Turned my closet into a place I actually enjoy walking into! I re-did every closet in my house with them. The hangers are great, non slip, and hold any kind of top or bottom you can imagine. I also ordered a pack of velvet skirt clips that fit perfect on these hangers. I will be ordering more of these exact hangers when/if I accumulate more clothes. No more mismatched hangers!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics Slim, Velvet, Non-Slip Clothes Suit Hangers, Black/Silver - Pack of 50
product_meta.description: Color:Black/Silver| Size:50-Pack| Style:Clothes HangersAn Amazon Brand.

Ultra slim profile to maximize space in your closet
Sturdy design can hold up to 10 pounds
Product Dimensions: 17.4 x 0.2 x 9.2 inches (LxWxH) ; 2.08 ounces
